title: BRIEF-Asian Paints Ltd Says CEO K.B.S Anand To Retire On March 31, 2020
text:
BRIEF-Asian Paints Ltd Says CEO K.B.S Anand To Retire On March 31, 2020

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 22, 2019 20:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Asian Paints Ltd Says CEO K.B.S Anand To Retire On March 31, 2020 Oct 22 (Reuters) - Asian Paints Ltd : * ASIAN PAINTS LTD SAYS K B S ANAND, MANAGING DIRECTOR & CEO WILL BE RETIRING FROM THE COMPANY ON 31ST MARCH, 2020 * ASIAN PAINTS LTD SAYS AMIT SYNGLE CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER, WILL SUCCEED KBS ANAND * ASIAN PAINTS LTD SAYS CFO JAYESH MERCHANT WILL BE RETIRING FROM THE COMPANY ON 26TH NOVEMBER, 2019

BRIEF-Asian Paints Ltd Says CEO K.B.S Anand To Retire On March 31, 2020
description: BRIEF-Asian Paints Ltd Says CEO K.B.S Anand To Retire On March 31, 2020
